name: Furnoids: Protecting the City
description:
• Furnoids is a short, fun retro game that's a mixture of Pinball, Space Invaders and a 2D Platformer with endless gameplay.

• The game runs at 60fps even on older devices.

• You can unlock extra games and modes by earning unlock pts.

• You have two control options (slide & tap or tilt & tap).

• You can play the game as either a single Furnoid or play the game as a team of 3 Furnoids.

• You can even play your own mp3 during gameplay (mp3 must be in the Music folder on your device and it may work either internally or from your SD card).

• This version has no ads and better external music compatibility.
